Mr. Harold E. Hill, Associate Director

111 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harold*
I am sure you are ,,:beating yourself11 too
much in your letter of October 7 to Jim Miles. It
wasn*t a very important point but, when I began to
be annoyed by the receipt of several communications

delighted to find some small point on which I could
send along a suggestion to indicate that I want to
